body_html:
both machines have different graphics cards.

What you need to do is use this command:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/docker/pytorch/Dockerfile#L28-L30

It will make sure that PyTorch is built not just for the local machine's GPU type, but all GPU types

body:
both machines have different graphics cards.

What you need to do is use this command:
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/docker/pytorch/Dockerfile#L28-L30

It will make sure that PyTorch is built not just for the local machine's GPU type, but all GPU types
